column1: Kata Robata////We went for the "omakase" experience at Kata Robata
column2: which means "it's up to you" in Japanese. This means it's up to Chef Hori-san on what you will be eating for dinner. He created 10 dishes for us - from on and off the menu or if he has some fresh fish
column3: he may try to put something together for you. If you've never experienced an omakase dinner
column4: this is the place to do it with one of Houston's few Japanese sushi chef
column5: who couldn't be nicer or more fun with some amazing food
